  • Method Details

    • addContact

      public void addContact(String name, String phoneNumber, String email)
      Method to add a contact to the address book
      Parameters:
      name - - name of the contact
      phoneNumber - - phone number of the contact
      email - - email of the contact
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the contact already exists or if the contact information is not valid

    • getContacts

      public ArrayList<Contact> getContacts()
      Testing method to get the contacts in the address book
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Contact objects

    • removeContact

      public void removeContact(String input)
      Method to remove a contact from the address book
      Parameters:
      input - - name, phone number or email of the contact to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the contact does not exist or if the contact information is not valid

    • checkIfNameOrPhoneNumberOrEmail

      public String checkIfNameOrPhoneNumberOrEmail(String input)
      Method to check if the input is a name, phone number or email
      Parameters:
      input - - name, phone number or email of the contact
      Returns:
      String - "name", "phoneNumber" or "email"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input is not of type email, phone number or name

    • removeByEmail

      public void removeByEmail(String email)
      Method to remove a contact by email
      Parameters:
      email - - email of the contact to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the contact email is not found

    • removeByPhoneNumber

      public void removeByPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber)
      Method to remove a contact by phone number
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - - phone number of the contact to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the contact phone number is not found

    • removeByName

      public void removeByName(String name)
      Method to remove a contact by name
      Parameters:
      name - - name of the contact to be removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the contact name is not found

    • editContact

      public void editContact(String currentName, String currentPhoneNumber, String currentEmail, String newName, String newPhoneNumber, String newEmail)
      Method to edit a contact in the address book
      Parameters:
      currentName - - current name of the contact
      currentPhoneNumber - - current phone number of the contact
      currentEmail - - current email of the contact
      newName - - new name of the contact
      newPhoneNumber - - new phone number of the contact
      newEmail - - new email of the contact
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the contact does not exist

    • checkIfContactExists

      public void checkIfContactExists(String name, String phoneNumber, String email)
      Method to check if a contact already exists in the address book
      Parameters:
      name - - name of the contact
      phoneNumber - - phone number of the contact
      email - - email of the contact
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the contact already exists
